Form exceptions¶

All exceptions that can be raised by the form.

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.ConditionDefinitionError(message)¶

Condition definition is incorrect.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.DuplicateVariableName(message)¶

Variable name is duplicate.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.ExpressionCompileError(message)¶

Exception related to expression errors.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.FieldDefinitionError(message)¶

Form field definition error.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.FieldValueError(message)¶

Answer value does not matches with expected form field type.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.InvalidCalculatedFieldExpression(message)¶

Calculated field expression is incorrect.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.InvalidCalculatedFieldSchema(message)¶

Calculated fields schema is incorrect.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.InvalidConstantSchema(message)¶

Constant schema for the form is incorrect.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.InvalidFormClass(message)¶

Form exception for invalid component wrapper class.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.InvalidFormSchemaError(message)¶

Form schema has some errors.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.InvalidWidgetError(message)¶

Form field widget is invalid.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.LayoutDefinitionError(message)¶

Layout definition is incorrect.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

exception form_builder.form_exceptions.VariableDefinitionError(message)¶

Form variable definition is incorrect.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh
